settings.heading: RESTORE VOLUME
settings.title: Lip Filler
settings.body: For many people, if a single feature on their face causes insecurity, it can really affect their self-confidence. With the smile being one of the most noticeable features, it’s not surprising when thin lips cause this distress. Luckily, thin lips are a feature Balanced Aesthetics Medspa can shape to something more full and plush in just a few minutes.

settings.text: The body naturally produces hyaluronic acid to bring skin nutrients and hydration. As such, there’s minimal risk of rejection or adverse effects with the injection specialists at Balanced Aesthetics. Schedule a consultation with us to learn which JUVÉDERM® lip filler is ideal for you.

Whether you’ve wanted plump lips for ages or have noticed recently you’ve lost volume in them, you have to wait no longer than your first appointment to see results. The gel enhances the shape and volume of your lips immediately, and while there may be some mild swelling that initially obscures your results, they’ll be apparent within a few days of your appointment. You may enjoy the plushness of your lips for up to 6-9 months with JUVÉDERM® Ultra XC, or up to 9-12 months with JUVÉDERM® Vollure™.

settings.question: How Does Lip Filler Work?
settings.answer:
The idea behind JUVÉDERM® lip fillers is that a thinner, more spreadable gel gives your Balanced Aesthetics’ experienced, injector more control over the final outcome of your lip enhancement. At Balanced Aesthetics Medspa, we use two JUVÉDERM® fillers to plump the lips: JUVÉDERM® Ultra XC and JUVÉDERM® Vollure™ XC. What’s the difference between them?

Both JUVÉDERM® Ultra XC and JUVÉDERM® Vollure™ are made up of hyaluronic acid (HA) molecules and contain lidocaine to make the injecting process as comfortable as possible. Their differences are subtle. Ultra XC is manufactured using the same molecular weight of HA molecules for a consistent, predictable gel perfect for beautifully enhanced lips and the correction of lines around the mouth. Vollure™ is manufactured by cross-linking high-to-low molecular weights of HA molecules, allowing for more subtle lip enhancement for patients seeking a bit less drama in their pout. Changes to the lips require precision and artistry to avoid an over-filled appearance. Having both of these JUVÉDERM® fillers available gives Balanced Aesthetics Medspa everything we need to master your lip enhancement for natural and stunning results.

settings.question: What is the Treatment Like?
settings.answer: The lips are an extremely sensitive area of the face, and many clients come into Balanced Aesthetics slightly nervous about how the treatment will feel. Because the gel is infused with lidocaine, JUVÉDERM® lip fillers are as comfortable as possible. We also numb all of our patients with a topical anesthetic in the treatment area, to make the procedure as comfortable as possible. After your session is complete, you’ll be free to return to your regular schedule.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: It’s normal to experiencesome injection site tenderness, swelling, or redness, but these typically fade on their own in a few hours.

settings.text: No one wants to have their lips look overdone, too puffy, or asymmetrical, so having a professional perform your lip enhancement is vital to the success of your outcome. Our talented Aesthetics Injectors have been specially trained and are uniquely qualified in the art of lip enhancement with JUVÉDERM® lip fillers. There’s nowhere better to achieve soft, plush lips that compliment your features than Balanced Aesthetics Medspa.

Don’t forget to use your Allē points to receive discounts on all of your neurotoxin and filler needs!
